olm.calcite.PCO2FromSolution¶

olm.calcite.PCO2FromSolution(sol)[source]¶

Calculate partial pressure of CO2 from a solution object.

Parameters
solsolution object, numpy.ndarray of solution objects, or pandas Series of solution objects
Returns
pCO2float, numpy.ndarray, or pandas series

partial pressure(s) of CO2 for the solution(s)

Notes

Assumes a H20-CO2-CaCO3 system. Uses equation 2.30 from Dreybrodt (1988) and assumes an open system.

olm.calcite.H2CO3sfromPCO2

Next topic
